thread.title: The Sai Baba project is still on: Dileep
thread.title_full: The Sai Baba project is still on: Dileep - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: The Sai Baba project is still on: Dileep
text:
Dileep had announced that he was part of a Sai Baba project titled Baba Sathya Sai in 2011 but there has been no news about the Kodi Ramakrishna directorial since.
The actor though now tells us that the "project is still on." "We had a few changes and now it will be a multi-lingual. The makers behind the film are busy with the scripting, which should be done by the end of this year," says the actor, adding that he hopes to begin filming from next year onwards.
Meanwhile Dileep has only one more release this year - Shafi's Two Countries - that has him playing a guy getting married to a Indo-Canadian girl so he could get Canadian citizenship.
